verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What wondrous love is this, newline O my soul, O my soul! newline What wondrous love is this, O my soul! newline What wondrous love is this newline That caused the Lord of bliss newline To bear the dreadful curse newline For my soul, for my soul, newline To bear the dreadful curse for my soul!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When I was sinking down, newline Sinking down, sinking down, newline When I was sinking down, sinking down; newline When I was sinking down newline Beneath God's righteous frown, newline Christ laid aside His crown newline For my soul, for my soul, newline Christ laid aside newline His crown for my soul!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To God and to the Lamb, newline I will sing, I will sing, newline To God and to the Lamb, I will sing! newline To God and to the Lamb newline Who is the "Great I Am" newline While millions join the theme newline I will sing, I will sing, newline While millions join the theme newline I will sing!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And when from death I'm free, newline I'll sing on, I'll sing on, newline And when from death I'm free, I'll sing on! newline And when from death I'm free, newline I'll sing and joyful be newline And through eternity newline I'll sing on, I'll sing on newline And thro' eternity, I'll sing on!
